title: Does flash belong on F or D?
body:
This is an interesting question that always gets asked at one point or another, and I always see interesting answers!

Very curious!

D is the most logical option. The average league of legends player has their left hand ring finger on the q, then middle on w, and pointer finger on e and alternating with r. Because you need to use flash to get out of sticky situation, it should be the most accessible. All you have to do is move your first finger slightly down to use flash, and you have to move is slightly down and to the right to use it on f. ;)

Fun fact, I have laugh bound to A for presumably similar reasons... Other than a slight modification in items, that's the only binding I've changed...

In my opinion... You should make your own keybindings and put it wherever you find it is most optimally placed for you. My summoner spells are 1 and 2, my ultimate is 3, my other 3 skills are Q,W,E and item actives are A,S,D, 4 is ward - I also use the ~ key for stop. But I always place my most defensive summoner spell on 1 and my less defensive summoner spell on 2 because I have become accustomed to hitting 1 in situations that call for popping of defensive abilities like flash - and by doing it that way I never accidentally hit flash when I mean to hit something else, or get confused when I use different summoner spells. If i did use the standard bindings I would probably put it on D. I would definitely suggest you get accustomed to always placing certain summoner spells on certain keys so that you don't confuse yourself and use the wrong one.
